editorialNotes.standard: If you can imagine it, you can create it—anything from monolithic towers to cavernous rollercoasters. That’s the idea that sparked a world-building phenomenon in Mojang’s amazing Minecraft. Since the game's release on the App Store, a steady stream of meaningful updates has kept this cube-filled universe fun, fresh and jam-packed with exciting features.

editorialNotes.tagline: Don't let the zombies stop you

ios.subtitle: Roll the Dice, Pass Go & Win

editorialNotes.standard: The infection has begun and it’s up to you to strategically spread and evolve a deadly plague to bring about the end of the human race. Saving the world and being a hero is honourable, but decimating the world with a deadly infection is a whole lot of fun — even though it shouldn’t be.

editorialNotes.standard: Everyone needs a task manager – and this Apple Design Award winner is adaptable enough for anyone. Organising items is as simple as dragging them where you want them, and the Magic Plus button makes it easy to add to-dos from anywhere in the app.

name: 黑暗神庙
artistName: Shenzhen Yaoyou Interactive Technology Co., Ltd

editorialNotes.tagline: From the creator of Plague Inc.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: After a long day at work, it’s bath time! But Swampy’s shower is broken and he needs your help to guide the water to him. Navigate a path through the dirt past contraptions and obstacles to get every drop to fill the bath.

editorialNotes.short: Explore endless vertical worlds controlling a four-legged alien.

name: 三國志天下布武 - 單機戰棋策略遊戲

editorialNotes.standard: What secrets lie in the shadows of this Apple Design Award–winning puzzler? By twisting and turning unfathomable objects, you cast shadows on beautifully rendered backgrounds; manipulate them just right and you’ll find shapes you’d never have expected—from rabbits to wrenches. Soothing ambient music and thematic backdrops make completing each challenge as much meditation as entertainment—while timers and achievements give each level a competitive feel.
editorialNotes.short: With stunning visuals and satisfying solutions, this game is one to savour.

editorialNotes.standard: Limbo is a gripping blend of stark, haunting landscapes, bizarre characters and unsettling sounds. With clever puzzle design, an intriguing narrative and an excellent touch-screen control system, it’s as rewarding to play as it is interesting to look at and listen to.
editorialNotes.short: Dark, haunting, beautiful. This'll stay with you long after it's over.

editorialNotes.tagline: Put an end to the terror

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Deliver packages to rebuild a ravaged society – and unravel supernatural mysteries – in this wild post-apocalyptic adventure crafted by legendary game maker Hideo Kojima.

name: Way of the Hunter Wild America
Tick Tock: A Tale for Two

editorialNotes.standard: Sure, there are skateboarding games that let you pull 900s from telephone wires, then land in a manual, collecting millions of points. But when you want realism and complexity, you want True Skate. For years, True Axis’ skateboarding simulator has been letting us ollie, grind, and kickflip with our fingers. Competing with your friends, scouting gaps, and completing missions is great fun, but the true reward is perfecting a line and nailing incredible tricks with just the right swipes.

editorialNotes.tagline: Team up to solve the puzzles
